title: Uwork
subtitle: UI/UX Design & Web Development
description: I developed Uwork, a mobile app at La Capsule Bootcamp. It connects jobseekers with companies, simplifying and democratizing the hiring process. Uwork revolutionizes traditional hiring, making it user-friendly and accessible. This project showcases my expertise in mobile app development and UX design.

title: thedailyjim
subtitle: Web Design & Web Development
description: During my free time, I have another name and a different passion alongside codingâ€”meet 'thedailyjim,' the photographer in me. Ever since my early years, I have been captivated by the art of photography, constantly seeking opportunities to venture beyond the confines of my home and capture the essence of life and the beauty of the surrounding landscapes.

title: Decathlon #1
subtitle: Web Development
description: As a personal project, I recreated selected pages of the Decathlon website using Decathlon APIs just for fun. I successfully replicated web pages from scratch, demonstrating proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I prioritized attention to detail, responsiveness, and clean code to deliver a seamless user experience.

title: Decathlon #2
subtitle: Web Development
description: For fun, I recreated a Decathlon-inspired design using Decathlon APIs. I added features like a search bar, pagination (12 sports per page), and the ability to filter Decathlon represented sports. Emphasizing a seamless user experience, I followed coding best practices to enhance functionality in web design.
